item.title: How to deploy a Python app on Streamlit
item.description: What is Python? Python is a versatile programming language that is used for a variety of tasks, from data analysis to machine learning. One of the key advantages of Python is that it can be used to create standalone executables that can be run on any machine, without requiring Python to be installed. In this article, we will explore how to deploy a Python executable via Streamlit, a powerful Python library for creating web applications.
